title: The M4 Mac mini we’d buy is down to a new best price today
content:
Macworld

Update May 11: The price of this model has been fluctuating throughout the weekend, but anything under $899 is still a great price.

It’s tiny, it’s powerful, and it’s on sale for the best price we’ve ever seen. We’re talking about the best-equipped version of the M4 Mac mini, with an M4 processor, 24GB of RAM, and 512GB of storage, which Amazon is now selling for $860.66, an impressive $139 discount off its $999 MSRP.

This itty bitty Mac fits on any desktop, allowing you to declutter your office and be more productive, concentrating easier on what you need to get done. The computer features the fast M4 chip, so you know it can handle any task you need to complete with blazing speed. Even better, this one comes with 24GB of memory, as well as 512GB of storage space, which is more than enough for apps, photos, and whatever work projects you will handle on this device.

When we reviewed the new Mac Mini, we loved its small footprint and excellent performance. We also appreciated that there are loads of ports available, including three Thunderbolt 4 port and HDMI on the back as well as a pair of USB-C ports on the front.

The M4 Mac mini starts at $599 with 16GB of RAM and 256GB of storage, but we recommend getting more if your budget allows it. If you’re OK with those limits, that model is also on sale for $506.28, a savings of $94 and near its all-time low. Or go get this loaded M4 Mac Mini for $872.05.
